nodes.text: The Federal District Police Academy, also known as FedPoAcad, was a law enforcement academy in the Federal District of the planet Coruscant that trained members of the Coruscant Security Force. Inspector Tanivos Divo earned a scholarship to the academy at sixteen years old and graduated from the academy as valedictorian in C.R.C. 7593. At the graduation ceremony, Divo delivered a speech before the 4,500 other graduating officers of his class. He then went on to becoming a patrolman in the Coruscant Security Force.
The Federal District Police Academy was first mentioned in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Scum and Villainy: Case Files on the Galaxy's Most Notorious, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo.
